api.name: extractDDC
api.description: extract the DDC logs based on user's input: dirpath and time information

dirpath.description: the directory path of the DDC logs, ask user to provide this information

endtime.description: end time, the DDC logs collected after this time

starttime.description: start time, the DDC logs collected before this time

time.description: the DDC log which includes the specified time

meta.title: DDCAssistant
meta.description: This is an DDC Assistant to help with DDC logs extracting and analysis
